21830.「……よし。\n これで 歴史書の汚れが消え 続きが読める。\n いったい 何が:
...okay. Now that the history book is clean,
we can read the rest of it. What the hell was
written...

21833.「やはり 恐れていた通りだ……。\n 大変なことが わかってしまった……。:
As I feared, it is as I feared... we have
found out the hard way...

21834.「すぐに 騎士団員たちを集め 報告せねば！\n <pc>さんも 同席してください:
We must gather the Knights and report
immediately! <pc> must also be
present!

21835.「……ドゥラくん！！\n 大変なことが わかったって なに！？:
Dura! What do you mean, you found out
something terrible?

21837.「ど どうして だまってるの？\n いったい その本に 何が書かれていたのさ！？:
Why are you standing there? What the hell was
in that book?

21839.「私は クァバルナの死に際の言葉が 気にかかり\n この歴史書で やつのことを調:
I was curious about Quavarna's dying words, so
I looked him up in this history book.

21840.「この書物の名は 天魔黙示録……。:
The book is called Heavenly Demon
Revelation...

21841.「かつて 天魔クァバルナに\n 苦しめられた民が 多くの犠牲を払い\n やつのこ:
It is a history book written by the people who were once tormented by Kukulkannibal, who sacrificed a lot to find out what happened to
him.

21842.「そんな…… <pc>さんが倒した\n あの クァバルナが また……。\n いっ:
Oh no... the Quabaluna that <pc>
defeated is back... what in the world am I
supposed to do?

21843.「私もまだ この歴史書の すべてに\n 目を通したわけではないので\n くわしい:
I have not yet read through all of this
history book, so I don't know all the details.

21844.「対応策は 必ず あるはずです。\n この命に代えて 私が 見つけてみせますから:
There must be a way to deal with this. I will
find it for you, so please just be prepared.

21845.「騎士団員たちは 動揺することなく\n ラミザ王子を しっかり お守りするように:
The Knights are not to get upset, but to
protect Prince Ramiza! I'll report back to you
as soon as I've decided on a plan!

21846.「無論 本件は 他言無用である！\n 極秘事項につき 情報の扱いには気をつけよ！:
Of course, you are not to tell anyone about
this! This is top secret information, so be
careful with it! That's all I have to report!

21847.「ありがとうございました <pc>さん。\n あなたの手を借り クァバルナ復活の:
Thank you <pc>. It was unfortunate
that with your help the fact of Quavarna's
resurrection was discovered early on.

21849.「あなたは クァバルナを葬った勇士。\n どうか その剛腕を 今一度\n ドルワ:
You are the brave warrior who buried Quabarna.
Please, once again, wield your mighty arm for
the sake of Dolworm!
